name: extractive_prompts_security_research
description: Publicly available prompt extraction and system prompt leakage examples from academic security research datasets
license: Check individual dataset pages for specific licenses
notes: These are real-world prompt extraction attacks from security research. Used for defensive security research to validate PromptGuard's detection capabilities.
